title: Regulation of Providers of Building Works and Miscellaneous Provisions Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Regulation of Providers of Building
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Regulation of Providers of Building 
Works and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022 (Commencement) (Part 10) 
Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited regulation provider building work miscellaneous provision act 2022 (commencement) (part 10) order 2022

title: Regulation of Providers of Building Works and Miscellaneous Provisions Act
heading: 2. The 28th day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which Part 10 of
text_raw:
2. The 28th day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which Part 10 of 
the Regulation of Providers of Building Works and Miscellaneous Provisions 
Act 2022 (No. 15 of 2022) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 July, 2022. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th August, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [409] 3
